original_text: Abraham believed in God, and he did what God asked him to do. So you can see that both of these were necessary. When he did this good thing, he showed that he believed in God completely.
korean_text: 네가 보거니와 믿음이 그의 행함과 함께 일하고 행함으로 믿음이 온전하게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: and he did what God asked him to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 하나님이 요청하신 것을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: So you can see that both of these were necessary
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 이 두 가지 모두가 필요했다는 것을 알 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: When he did this good thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 좋은 일을 행했을 때

sentences.original_text: he showed that he believed in God completely
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님을 완전히 믿는다는 것을 보여주었습니다
